definition: an intractably barbarous or uncultivated state of nature
details:
noun
- an intractably barbarous or uncultivated state of nature
- an unruly disposition to do as one pleases
= example: an unruly disposition to do as one pleases
- the property of being wild or turbulent
= synonyms: violence
- a feeling of extreme emotional intensity
= example: a feeling of extreme emotional intensity
= synonyms: abandon
